general_advisory: According to the weather forecast, very light rainfall may occur. Farmers are advised to postpone harvesting and spraying operations for some days.

advisory: Make arrangements to maintain sufficient water and drain out excess of stagnated rainwater from rice field.
Avoid irrigation and postpone harvesting and spraying operations for some days.
Keep the harvested produce in safe places.
Regular monitoring against different pests and disease should be advised.
Postpone all type of spraying and intercultural operations for some days.
Make provision to drain out excess water from field to avoid lodging of plant.
Irrigation as well as chemical application is recommended in okra.
Farmers should make provision for proper drainage system.
Farmers should go for sowing and planting of Cole crop.
Make proper drainage channels in field to drain out excess water.
